alert.note: Alert for Hampden; Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 3:53PM EDT until July 27 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HARTFORD...SOUTHWESTERN HAMPSHIRE AND WESTERN HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 352 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Westfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Granby, Southwick, Southampton, Hadley, East Granby, Hatfield and Huntington. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
